title: patient_by_number
description: SELECT id as "id", pt_no as "ptNo", patient_name as "patientName", gender as "gender", age as "age", resident_number as "residentNumber", department as "department", created_at as "createdAt" FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE pt_no = :ptNo

title: patient_by_department
description: SELECT id as "id", pt_no as "ptNo", patient_name as "patientName", gender as "gender", age as "age", resident_number as "residentNumber", department as "department", created_at as "createdAt" FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE department = :department

title: patient_by_age_range
description: SELECT id as "id", pt_no as "ptNo", patient_name as "patientName", gender as "gender", age as "age", resident_number as "residentNumber", department as "department", created_at as "createdAt" FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE age BETWEEN :minAge AND :maxAge ORDER BY age

title: chart_by_patient
description: SELECT c.chart_no as "chartNo", c.pt_no as "ptNo", c.chart_date as "chartDate", c.chart_time as "chartTime", c.visit_type as "visitType", c.department as "department", c.doctor_name as "doctorName", c.content as "content", c.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE p.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_date_range
description: SELECT c.chart_no as "chartNo", c.pt_no as "ptNo", c.chart_date as "chartDate", c.chart_time as "chartTime", c.visit_type as "visitType", c.department as "department", c.doctor_name as "doctorName", c.content as "content", c.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE c.chart_date BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_doctor
description: SELECT c.chart_no as "chartNo", c.pt_no as "ptNo", c.chart_date as "chartDate", c.chart_time as "chartTime", c.visit_type as "visitType", c.department as "department", c.doctor_name as "doctorName", c.content as "content", c.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE c.doctor_name = :doctorName ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: record_by_patient
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_chart
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: patient_stats_by_gender
description: SELECT gender as "gender", COUNT(*) as "count", AVG(age) as "avgAge" FROM ods.tbl_patient GROUP BY gender

title: recent_charts
description: SELECT c.chart_no as "chartNo", c.pt_no as "ptNo", c.chart_date as "chartDate", c.chart_time as "chartTime", c.visit_type as "visitType", c.department as "department", c.doctor_name as "doctorName", c.content as "content", c.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT :limit

title: record_by_pt_no
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_chart_no
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_pt_no_and_chart_no
description: SELECT r.form_no as "formNo", r.parent_form_no as "parentFormNo", r.pt_no as "ptNo", r.chart_no as "chartNo", r.name as "name", r.type as "type", r.record_data as "recordData", r.created_at as "createdAt", p.patient_name as "patientName" FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo AND r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
